segments.text: Jack , you should have known in general the situation of our company now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and I am very satisfied with it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please tell me about fringe benefits of the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , we will pay insurances for employees after the probationary period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Include endowment insurance , medical insurance , unemployment insurance , work-related injury insurance and maternity insurance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Employees will also have housing payment reserve funds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The fringe benefits in your company are excellent , and it's generous of you to offer five insurances and one fund
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to know if the staff can get a vacation every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The permanent staff can have a paid month-long vacation every year . Besides , they also get chances of free traveling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's quite good . Thank you for telling me about those .
segments.speaker: S2
